title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When performing a SaveAs operation on a java file, the file extension is not displayed in the Navigator panel after the operation is completed. The icon for the file is also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
EB: After performing a SaveAs operation on a java file, the file extension should be displayed in the Navigator panel after the operation is completed. The icon for the file should remain the same as the parent java file icon.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file (e.g., moving an existing class)
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save icon
4) A dialog will be displayed
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Type the filename without including the file extension (as it is not requested)
7) Click OK

Expected Result: The Navigator panel should display the file with the correct file extension and the icon should remain the same as the parent java file icon.
